response:
"warum gibt es immer noch companies, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of adequate measures to protect individuals' personal information and highlights the need for better data protection policies and regulations. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
